attributes.action: Continue the mandatory use of masks in enclosed public spaces
attributes.additional_details: Like NHS workers and care workers, food retail workers have worked all the way through this god awful pandemic. Allowing the public to use their discretion on where and when to wear masks is a blatant snub to those who've helped the general public to say safe and fed during this time. Out of respect for us, it is essential that the government keeps the mask law in place until such a time as covid infections start to drop significantly.
attributes.background: Keep the law in place to protect essential workers.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616

Keep mandatory face coverings in supermarkets and on public transport: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590836

Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694

Keep requirement to wear a face covering in shops & supermarkets after July 19th: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590829
